scenario_text.value: There they go again.
They sure told us...
Hah. They got nothin’.
Minoru! Kaito! How could you do that?!
What? Hey! Why are you mad at us?!
Seriously! What gives?

Isn’t it obvious? How could you lay a hand
on those poor little things?!
Don’t you have any mercy?
Yeah, Aoi’s right.
But...they rushed us. Didn’t you see that?
Back me up, will you, Takuma?
What? Why are you bringing me into this?

Even if they did charge us, they might not
have wanted to, you know?

Yeah. I’m sure they’re just scared of that
queen.
But you had to go and beat them up!
Only because they wouldn’t leave us alone.
Was that...really the right thing to do?
I thought they were gonna burst out crying.
Well, I never thought they’d be THAT weak!

Ain’t it good enough that it was just Kaito
alone, rather than me or Falcomon?

They got what they deserved. If they were
that weak, they never shoulda threatened us.
Yeah, what he said!
That’s not the issue here!

You might as well have been bullying
toddlers!
Urk...
I... I’m sorry, okay?
Now, listen!

From now on, no matter what those guys do,
you will not attack them!
All right, already...
Yeah, what he said.
Back me up, will you, Takuma?
Hey, leave me out of this!
So...does that take care of that?

Because I want to get back to looking for
Miu.
Right...yes. Let’s do that.

But, how do we look for her? This place is
huge, and she could be anywhere.

We’ll just have to split up and go corner to
corner, won’t we?
No! We can’t split up. It’s too dangerous!
Then how do we find Miu?

We’ll just have to all go together and check
the places we think she might be.
Nah, that sounds super inefficient, Shuuji.

He’s right. The park is big enough. Add in
checking the buildings and it’d take forever.

Shuuji, are you sure we shouldn’t just split
up and look around?
B-but what about this mysterious queen?
We’ll have to be careful about her, yes.
But we’ve all got our partners.

If anything happens, I’m sure if we work with
them, we’ll get through it.
Right! I’ll protect you, Takuma!
And I’ll keep you safe, Aoi!
Me too. I won’t let any harm come to Saki.
I believe we all share the same resolve.
You bet we do!
Me too! I’ll protect Shuuji...I know I can!
Yeah, right... As if you could ever—
Shuuji, you should have more faith in Lopmon.
So, are we sure this queen is bad news?
What do you mean?

It’s just...those little guys, they seemed...
easygoing? A little too comfortable.

If the queen was like Arukenimon or
Cyclonemon, they woulda been more scared.
Hmm. You could be right.

Yeah, and you’re like, the expert on fear,
Ryo, which makes it way more convincing.
Hey, shut up! Give me a break, would you?!

Either way, without any idea what she’s like,
we ought to stay on our guard.
That’s true.

B-but what about Haru and Miyuki?! Won’t they
be in serious dang—
Won’t they be in serious dang—
We’ll be okay.
What?
I’ll be fine, as long as I have my sister.
You’ll be fine, too, right, Sis?
Right...

Well, you heard ’em. What do you say to that,
Shuuji?
Urgh... Okay, okay.
B-but let’s not get too far from each other!

And if you think you might be in danger,
don’t try anything stupid.
Make sure you follow those rules!
Right! No problem!
All right, then let’s get searching!

Haru, Miyuki... Both of you be careful too,
okay?

Agumon and I will go check out things, so
if anything happens, call for us.
Right! You can count on me!
Okay... We will.
We will...
All right, let’s get out there too, Agumon!
Yeah!
